page.title: 12JOURNALISM IN CARMARTHEN
page.content: Carmarthen Times On Friday May 17th we visited the Carmarthen Times Office.The two main events since the newspaper started are how the kidney unit is going to be financed and cuts in Council spending. These are some of the notes we thought were important: MONITORING BIG BLASTS-Nuclear missiles staff worried about testing Pendine. M.P. FIGHT FOR A POST OFFICE-Roger Thomas asked to save Post Office. KIDNEY UNIT BLACKMAIL ROW-Family Doctor accused Welsh secretary of accepting private Kidney Unit. HEAD MASTER ATTACKS SCHOOL FEES- A Head Master has accused councillor of breaking law because of not providing free education for children. by Jessica Murphy
